title: Thanet
name: Thanet
description:
A Map by Drmoores

The Isle of Thanet in Kent. Birchington, Westgate on Sea, Margate, Broadstairs, Minster and Ramsgate to Name but a few places on an island which isn't anymore.

properties.name: Dent de Lion- Garlinge - Thanet
properties.description: Posted by DrmooresThe remains of the manor of Dent de Lion castle in Garlinge on the Isle of Thanet

properties.name: Dreamland Amusement Park, Margate
properties.description: Posted by DrmooresDreamland Amusement Park, Margate, Thanet, KentThe site of the Dreamland amusement park in Margate and home of the legendary scenic railway. Today, a shadow of its former glory and looking for a place in the 21st century as the local council attempts to find a future for the site as a modern entertainment centre to attact tourists to Margate.

properties.name: Kent International Airport - Manston
properties.description: Posted by DrmooresManston Airport, Kent International, ThanetLondon Manston, grandly named "Kent International Airport" at Manston in Kent. Should be re-opening for passenger flights in summer 2006 after the collapse of carrier EUjet in September 2005. Also home to theThanet Flying Club, TG Aviation.

properties.name: Margate Harbour - Isle of Thanet
properties.description: Posted by DrmooresMargate HarbourMargate Harbour with Droit House, the planned spot for the Turner Contemporary Gallery, which has now been moved to the Rendezvous Car Park

properties.name: Margate Old Town
properties.description: Posted by DrmooresMargate;s Old Town quarter under regeneration.

properties.description: Posted by DrmooresMinnis Bay, Isle of Thanet, KentThe best place to view one of the remarkable sunsets made famous by the painter Joseph William Turner in the 19th century -
